In 1921, the song was arranged by English composer Peter Wilhousky under the title 'Carol of the Bells,' turning it into an international hit.In 2003, 'Shchedryk' was added to the US National Recording Registry, making it part of the United States’ cultural heritage and further cementing its status as one of the world’s most iconic musical works.
